Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class roboptim::retargeting::detail::DistanceToReference< T >

Quadratic function computing the distance between a vector and a reference.

This formula is widely used as a cost function. In this particular case, it will be used by DistanceToMarker class (by chaining JointToMarker and this class).

Input: x (size: reference vector size) Output: (size: 1)

This should be probably promoted as a generic class in RobOptim Core at some point.

Template Parameters:
Tfunction trait
